alert.note: Alert for Blair; Cambria (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 09 at 2:31PM EDT until September 09 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Blair County in central Pennsylvania... Southeastern Cambria County in central Pennsylvania... * Until 300 PM EDT. * At 231 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lilly, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Altoona, Hollidaysburg, Portage, Lakemont, Cresson, Gallitzin, Duncansville, Lilly, Sankertown, Horseshoe Curve, Ski Gap and Canoe Creek State Park. This includes Interstate 99 from mile markers 22 to 38. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Stay inside a well built structure and keep away from windows. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this severe thunderstorm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
